Recipe - Class in com.recipe.entity
Recipe this class used to create database and connect to database here we used the new_recipe database table name here same as class name = recipe here added all the validation to table

RecipeController - Class in com.recipe.controller
The RecipeController class handle the all the RestApi CrossOrigin this is used here for passing data to client side RestController this is used for creating bean for Controller

RecipeNotFoundException - Exception in com.recipe.exception
RecipeNotFoundException this class to handle custom Exception of Recipe not found in DB here return the response HttpStatus NOT_Found

RecipeRepository - Interface in com.recipe.repository
RecipeRepository this class to handle custom and general JpaRepository here custom findByInstructionAndNotByIngredent method is used here use NativeQuery for MySql database
RecipeService - Interface in com.recipe.service
RecipeService this interface is used for handle repository services this interface implements in RecipeServiceImpl
RecipeServiceImpl - Class in com.recipe.service
RecipeServiceImpl this class implements RecipeService this class get value from repository and pass value to RecipeController class
